title: Gustavo de Simone
text:
Gustavo Daniel de Simone Horn (born April 23, 1948) is an <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="coach%20%28sport%29">coach</a> and former national team player.
Club career.
As a player, he had a short stint in <a href="Argentina">Argentina</a> with <a href="Chacarita%20Juniors">Chacarita Juniors</a> where he played 24 league games.
International career.
Desimone represented his country in 3 <a href="FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification">FIFA World Cup qualification</a> matches.
